title: Touhou Project Compilation [TH01 - TH12.3]
description:
This is a full Touhou Project game compilation, with all existing official Touhou Games made by Team Shanghai Alice (ZUN) and Tasogare Frontier.

This torrent also includes all currently available official patches for all the games, including all fan-made translations.
